title: avatAram ettinADE
sahitya:
avatAram ettinADE saccidAnanda jyOti anAdi sanAtana puruSuDu


anupallavi

  shivamugA jIvuni celuva mereya jEsi divya jIvanamiyya dInajanAvanuDu


caraNam    avalamaina jAti bhEdamunu mAlpi Atma samayOga aikyamunu stApinci navayuga 
sAmrAjya nAyaka tvam vahinci nara nArAyaNa brndamunu shrSTimpa EkadEva jIvalOka 
Eka jnAna bhakti karma yOgabhOga mosagu nitya shuddha shakti paramAtmuDu
